TextBlock.Text: <color=#E0ACAC>ZENIVE</color>: I am preserving this recording as an explanation to what has happened to this system.
<color=#E0ACAC>ZENIVE</color>: We are the Nomai, a peaceful species driven by our pursuit of knowledge.
<color=#E0ACAC>ZENIVE</color>: This laboratory was constructed to research a potential means of creating infinite, clean energy.
<color=#E0ACAC>ZENIVE</color>: We have invented specialized 'Energy Replicators', capable of producing an excess energy without the introduction of additional matter.
<color=#E0ACAC>ZENIVE</color>: A recent test with these Energy Replicators has gone awry. It has destroyed one of the systems planets, leaving a molten core surrounded by a cloud of debris.
<color=#E0ACAC>ZENIVE</color>: Due to its proximity, the glacial planet we have come to call home is melting. This lab will soon be flooded.

<color=#E0ACAC>ZENIVE</color>: This system has been irreversibly damaged. Our actions constitude an act of war in most galactic diplomatic regions. We Nomai cannot afford to be seen having caused this.
<color=#E0ACAC>ZENIVE</color>: It pains me to say this, but we must evacuate this system immediately.
<color=#E0ACAC>ZENIVE</color>: If you are reading this recording, know that we Nomai did not intend to cause this senseless destruction.

<color=#E0ACAC>ZENIVE</color>: I do not have the time to redact our research. I am leaving this message to urge readers to reconsider any findings within this structure. Our mistake cannot afford to be repeated.
<color=#B3E2AE>ENGINELL</color>: <color=#E0ACAC>Zenive</color>! What are you still doing in the laboratory? We need to go, come on!
